execute.desc:
This bot may stop suddenly.
If the bot is offline, You can turn the bot online by visiting upper link.

Below you can see all commands.
For more information about spicific command, type `%scommand`.
(e.g. `%shelp ping`)
execute.descNotEmbed:
This bot may stop suddenly.
If the bot is offline, You can turn the bot online by visiting https://flashbot-discord.herokuapp.com 

Below you can see all commands.
For more information about spicific command, type `%scommand`.
(e.g. `%shelp ping`)
execute.title: FlashBot Help
execute.noEmbedPerm:
```The bot doesn't have 'POST LINK'(or similar) permission to display help message as embed, so it'll show just text help message.
(Currnetly developing for turning off this notification)```

commands.name: commands
commands.desc: commands you want to see its help message

serverinfo.result:
Server Name: **%s**
Members in the Server: %s

execute.isDM: This command cannot be used in DM.

userinfo.desc: Shows some informations of the user who execute the command.

eval.desc: Evaluates JS code. Needs Administrator permission to use this.

execute.no_admin: You do not have Administrator permission!

execute.no_args: Enter command to reload. (Currently not working)

lang.desc: view this bot's current language and change it. (todo: manage language per-server)

language.name: language
language.desc: language code you want to change to.

execute.noPermission: You don't have `ADMINISTRATOR` permission to do that.
execute.noLanguage: The language you entered does not exist.

execute.title: Activate **FlashBot**
execute.content:
**FlashBot** stores registered user's name, discordTag, id, and many other things. 
Also, **FlashBot** stores activated server's name, id, roles, members, owner, and more.
In order to activate **FlashBot** in this server, you must agree to the Privacy Policy.
Please read the document carefully, and agree them to activate and use **FlashBot**.
You can deny them if you want. If so, you can't use **FlashBot**.
execute.confirm: React with :white_check_mark: or type `Yes` to agree, otherwise react with :x: or type `No` to deny.
execute.deny: You denied our Privacy Policy. Bot Activation for this server cancelled.
execute.agree: Thank you! You agreed with our Privacy Policy. The Bot is now activated on this server. You (and this server's member) can use this bot right now!
execute.reactFail:
The Bot does not have `Add Reaction` permission, so the bot could not add reaction.
Please enter response via text, or add reaction manually.

execute.title: Deactivate **FlashBot**
execute.content:
You're now going to disable **FlashBot** on this server.
When deactivated, the bot will not respond any commands except `activate`.
The data for this server will be stored after you deactivated the bot.
execute.confirm: React with :white_check_mark: or type `Yes` to confirm deactivation, otherwise react with :x: or type `No` to cancel.
execute.agree: Thank you for using our bot. The bot is now disabled in this server. To reactivate, use the `activate` command.
execute.reactFail:
The Bot does not have `Add Reaction` permission, so the bot could not add reaction.
Please enter response via text, or add reaction manually.

command_error: An error occured while executing the command.
